title: Bhagavad Gita
author: Ved Vyasa
description: The eternal dialogue between Lord Krishna and Arjuna on the battlefield of Kurukshetra. A timeless guide to dharma, karma, and spiritual wisdom.

title: Ramayana
author: Valmiki
description: The epic tale of Lord Rama's journey, his exile, and the victory of dharma over adharma. A story of devotion, courage, and righteousness.

title: Shiva Purana
author: Ved Vyasa
description: Ancient texts describing the glory of Lord Shiva, his manifestations, and the path to liberation through devotion.

title: Hanuman Chalisa
author: Tulsidas
description: Forty verses in praise of Lord Hanuman, offering strength, courage, and protection to devotees.

title: Durga Saptashati
author: Ved Vyasa
description: Seven hundred verses glorifying the Divine Mother, recounting her victories over demonic forces.

title: Vishnu Sahasranama
author: Ved Vyasa
description: Thousand names of Lord Vishnu, each revealing a divine attribute and aspect of the Supreme Being.
